website_summaries.verdict: A quality manicure kit that features several tools for a good price.
pros: Includes finger and toenail clippers, peeling knives, cuticle trimmers, toenail nipper, nail file, v-shaped push stick, tweezers, scissors, blackhead needle, and ear pick
Tools are sharp and sturdy and the case is good quality as well
cons: Some tools are a little stiff at first
Black matte coating can wear or chip

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: I had this for 10 mins before the nail clipper broke. I was cutting my son’s nails and it’s pretty tight, so I had to squeeze hard. After I was done I spun the bottom part to close the clippers and it completely fell apart. It’s junk.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J Berry

customer_reviews.title: Sooo beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my man for Christmas because he was always using the nail kit I had. The teal color with the black tools is seriously elegant and my boyfriend loves it. He said it was one of the best Christmas presents he got which surprised me. We are actually trying to coordinate other bathroom/travel supplies to match. The tools are very sturdy, especially the cuticle trimmer which has the black handle but a nice sharp metal tip that does the job great. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good set
customer_reviews.text: This set has every tool you could ever need to take care of your nails! However, I was a little disappointed in the quality. Would have sacrificed the extra tools for fewer items with higher quality, like stainless steel. Price is ok though. Case seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Chewbaka

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could possibly need.
customer_reviews.text: This has every tool you could think off. I initially was just looking for nail clippers and a skinfork to replace old,dull, crappy ones that I had. They are well made and very! sharp! They go back in the case quite easily. I just wish there were instructions on how to use some of the scrapers, the photos are just too vague. But over all I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but no
customer_reviews.text: All the clippers brook on first use. The cuticle nippers are chunky so you can't use them properly. You're basically buying a case because that is the nicest feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this manicure set. Everything you could ever need to give yourself a professional manicure is included. Love the carry case which makes it easier to keep track of everything. I purchased this for myself and am extremely pleased with my purchase. I plan to order more as these would make perfect gifts or stocking stuffers. Highly recommend this manicure set. Built extremely well, I have no doubt that it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Limburg

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Shipped withing 2 days as expected. I love the variety of tools but the only downside is that it didn't come with instruction/description of each tool which is fine since amazon had the description on their site. Other than that I have no complaints I'm happy with this product and would definately recommend to friends and families.
customer_reviews.author: yajaira rosario

customer_reviews.title: This one is worth the by
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set and the quality is superb I would definitely buy more for friends as gifts as mine still is working great and they are good quality that handle my thick nails. I really do not like the case it’s not comfortable to use it’s not easy to use I took out all the pieces and put them in an open box I would like to see the box change and be easier to put the items in and out of other than that it is a great product
customer_reviews.author: ricky salazar

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I got this and loved it even gave my dad one for Xmas, but make sure to sanitize this product before use. I have never gotten a nail fungus but after my using the product I started to see my toe nail change color. I was able to just use Vick’s on it (weird google hack I learned) and it is now slowly going away. I can’t be absolutely sure if the product caused it buuuut it’s always better to be safe than sorry. Lesson learned. Anyways, I still really liked the product, all is nice and secure inside and everything you might want to use is available.
customer_reviews.author: ChiquiM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First time using the kit i had two pieces (largest nail clippers and scissors) break - they just fell apart. I'm not going to try to return it as there are still many other working tools in the kit and it's not worth the hassle but I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineAndWhiskey

customer_reviews.title: Nail kit so- so
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp and sliced my finger open with one of the tools. Otherwise it’s a great set, just be really careful. The carrier and clasp is not the best... it doesn’t fully close so if you don’t make sure all the pieces are put back in the right place they will fall out in your purse
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Kuster

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it and the case started coming apart. The scissors are also so thin they don’t feel like they’d do a good job. I haven’t tried to use it really since the case started falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Nice size,secure wipeable case
customer_reviews.text: It was much bigger than it looked on the pic which is a plus. The carrying case is wipeable and clicks easily for closure and the tools are secure inside ,held down by a snap or band. The scissors feel kinda flimsy though,like they may break if not handled gently. Overall a nice product and giftable as well, looks easy to wrap since it comes inside of one of the sellers boxes already.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: this kit is fair however cheaply made and breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: So at first all i needed this kit for was for travel and quick access however yesterday I had to use the cutters in the kit, the handle broke in two and it never cut through my nail at all though when it broke I almost pulled my nail off. most of the kit has some fair equipment for the cost however I do not recommend this product if you're needing these cheap cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Little Peach Gifts

customer_reviews.title: Great Nail Kit
customer_reviews.text: Of course I would not recommend taking this on your carry on, it's great if you're checking a bag in! The container is very sturdy and durable. The sleeves keep everything in their spots, some a bit hard to pull out and put back in. But that's okay, at least I know they wont fall out when I open it! Have had it for a while now and its been a life saver when I have really bad nail care and need a specific nail tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Rage

customer_reviews.title: Buy this kit! You won’t regret it! Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this manicure kit. High quality and the price is great. Bought mine and loved it so I bought 2 more as gifts for my sisters. Highly recommend this kit!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Sanchez-Colon

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy feeing case. Great for traveling. The clippers are very sharp and work really well. I did notice that there were a few black specks on my hands after using the clippers though. I'm afraid the paint on the metal may rub or chip off eventually. Overall they work well and the case is a nice addition. I have yet to try the other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Koto

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set especially for the price. The material of all pieces is solid very nice and precise. I purchased mostly for a few of the tools but even the tweezers which I didn’t expect much from are great. I purchased this as our families new grooming kit. I am very satisfied with the product quality and price as well as the super fast delivery. This item would make a great gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: ROCKCANDII

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Tool Quality
customer_reviews.text: All of these tools are high quality. I've had a mani/pedi set that was in such terrible in quality, that the fingernail "clippers" would only bend my nail, and not clip it. So, this a life saver. I even showed it to someone I know and they love it so much that they want to buy one themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Van Sandt

customer_reviews.title: Love It but Confused
customer_reviews.text: They are great quality. The only complaints I have are the nail clippers are loud and there is no instructions on what each tool is and how to use it. I couldn't find anything online either so I'm just guessing what to do with some of them lol
customer_reviews.author: Beth C.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. Some of the shaving tools are as sharp as I was hoping they would be. The toenail nipper is smaller and struggles with a really thick toenail...I will shop for a larger / stronger one separately. Happy with this purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Good tweezers and utensils are sharp and durable
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased 2 of these for myself and gifts after I tried another kit because the tweezers were way too small in the other. The tweezers work well in this one and the matte black finish is nice. The tools are strong and blades are SHARP. I wish this kit had the reusable ear wax extractor/metal ear swab but the quality and cute case and good tweezers makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Cuticle cutter broke first use..
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, and everything I've tried so far has been a good product. Except the cuticle cutter broke on the first use, 2nd cuticle... which really sucks because that's one of my most needed items in here.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love using the 4 - 5 pieces I utilize. I just didn't need this large of a kit for my personal needs. I like utilizing the hang-nail clippers when needed. The others I'm not sure how to use and sometimes it's hard to use myself. They are in a nice traveling kit!
customer_reviews.author: HawaiianSis

customer_reviews.title: Not High Quality At All
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller Nautica set similar to this that had lasted me 9 years so I decided to get a new one. This kit is not high quality. The paint is already starting to come off the swivel on the nail clippers after 1 use. Also, the rear binding is already starting to come apart on the case. I just purchased this a few days ago. Not very happy. But thats what you get when you spend $15 for 14 tools....
customer_reviews.author: mildred123

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. I actually really enjoy the professional look and feel. These tools are sharp and well worth the cost. They will be here for a lifetime.this could double as an emegency kit as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Allen

customer_reviews.title: So handy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in my end table and to take when traveling, but lately I’ve been using this set more than my expensive nail clippers and tweezers. I’ve even used these tools when taking off my gel nail polish. And I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Great nail kit! There's items in this kit I've had a difficult time finding in the past and items that I've never actually seen in a nail kit. The horizontal nail clipper is great if you deal with ingrown nails occasionally. I definitely recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little manicure kit!
customer_reviews.text: It’s in a very nice carrying case. About the height an 1in wider of an iPhone XR and about an in thick. it came with everything shown. Some of the sharper things came with a little guard over them.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lady

customer_reviews.title: Like the product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the price. It’s part of my sisters birthday gift and when I opened the shipping package the box it was in was open and slightly damaged. Kinda of bummed about that as it looks cheap now for a birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed in this purchase to be honest. Guess I didn't realize this is a soft case...I was looking for a hard case. This soft case is going to get poked and scratched. I for see it wearing quickly. The contents of the case are great though!
customer_reviews.author: Louwho

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything tool a home/travel manicure kit should have. I love the slanted blade! It removes dead skin but beware, it's so sharp you can slice a little too much deep, if not careful, so proceed with caution until you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: J=mc^2

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Should have looked more closely at reviews. Toenail clipper broke instantly. Cheap metal overall and was missing tweezers. Dont waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a nail biter extraordinaire and expressed a desire to manage her nails instead of bite them and this kit was my gift for her to help encourage her. She carries it around in her purse and hasn't had a single issue with any of the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Decent Set of Tools
customer_reviews.text: This set is what it shows and the sharp tools are definitely sharp. This kit has been helpful in getting my hands and feet in better condition. I like that I have options to help keep my nails healthy as well as other tools like tweezers and the acne wand. The case seems a little cheap on the outside like it could snag or get cut easily. Otherwise, a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Viere

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit with everything you might need. I really only needed a few of these things, but it was a great price for the whole set of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenclaw Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal. Great little set for the price. Has a nice weight to the case as well as all of the tools. They are sharp and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Chanelle Doney

customer_reviews.title: It okay...not durable as i thought
customer_reviews.text: The nail clipper is sharp. However, some nail clipper is easy to break when I tried to use it, I twist the nail clipper cap and the wire nail is loosening, then fall off. Nice material, if you need a whole kit and affordable, I will be recommended this. However, if you only need a good nail clipper, I think you should reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Hanie

customer_reviews.title: It's a steal for this price.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for and the tools are all good metal. I loved mine so much two of my friends even wanted it and got one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Ok, thing for the price
customer_reviews.text: At first I saw it was made of some dark metal or some like it, but it is just a layer of print on it. Once start using it the prints start falling off. And the in grow clipper’s end point isn’t as sharp. The case is nice, and it is easy to take on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Feng

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the tools are black and comes with an easy to use kit. Very sturdy and works great. Even used them on my boyfriend's feet!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: nice and sharp
customer_reviews.text: very durable kit. i'm not much of a nail grooming person, but this set is so good! love the different tools you can use to clean up those nails. another plus is that it has tweezers and those blackhead removers. great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This care kit works very well. The razors kind of hurt, so I don't use those much but everything else feels very durable and work well. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Blackard

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Has most all of what you need to clean and trim nails with some bonuses. Really nice color and a bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Bit extreme
customer_reviews.text: Bought this...and really only needed a basic manicure set...this one has TONS in it...it's honestly a bit extreme with little blades and everything in it. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellora

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and unusable. This is the worst thing I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Beverlee Cholewa

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and has everything needed for a complete pedicure and manicure! Compact and hardly takes up any room in my luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Duranceau

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I made my own toiletry bag for the men that helped out at our wedding. These were by far the favorite item in the bag. Everyone told me that they were great quality and they loved how sharp the clippers were. My dad said they were better than any of the clippers that he had purchased. I spent a lot of time looking for a good set that was not too expensive and this one was the best one at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I like having all the tools together in a little packet, it's nice and organized plus the packet is pretty cute. Wish it had some instructions to say what each item is and what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Soechting

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife, Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: My lady loves it. Loves the color. Loves the kit. She does nails and currently in cosmetology school. If she loves it then I know it’s a good buy. Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K.

customer_reviews.title: Great traveling item.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a flight attendant and he loves his new set. Small enough to fit anywhere in his bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tools. I wish it came with a sheet that tells you what each one is for, but over all great quality and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Okay I guess
customer_reviews.text: Nice but don’t feel as sharp as they should be. I have some cheap single clippers that seem to cut easier.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Well-made manicure set
customer_reviews.text: The manicure set is an amazing gift for men and women. This product is very durable and all the instruments work very well. I love the color and it makes it easy for it not to slip out of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to use because it's tough and I'm not that strong but it is industrial and is really sharp.
customer_reviews.author: RealTalk

customer_reviews.title: My go to when doing my nails
customer_reviews.text: This grooming it’s so worth the money. Everything feels like it’s made of a really good quality and for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice however, the coating does not allow for the tools to be used at ease.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid case, as shiwn
customer_reviews.text: Loved it!! It was exactly what we wanted. Already used the pedicure accessories and worked very well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dyna

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Opened to find one took I bought and waited for was broken before it could be used
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Low quality. Scissors not sharp enough to clip hairs, just pulled them then clipped them. Looks nice, but overall functionality was lacking.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome! Buying these items individually would easily cost 3x as much. I love the cuticle pushers and scrapers. The cuticle nipper could be sharper but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 6!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it. I thought the nippers were kinda small but I got use to that quickly so it's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else of better quality
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. Try Revlon. Better to spend a little extra and have a good product. Gave it to my son, it’s not great.
customer_reviews.author: Juds

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend has now had this for several months - no complaints. Everything came intact, sharp, and functional. Came as shown - blue inside is vibrant and eye catching. There is a tool for any grooming need that may arrive. My personal favorites are the eyebrow trimmers (little scissors) and the toenail clippers. Awesome kit to have!
customer_reviews.author: Celia C.

customer_reviews.title: Pure satisfaction!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those products that utterly shocks your expectations !!! I absolutely love this tool kit, it has everything I need and I can tell they will hold well with use and traveling. Been recommending this to other people as well because of the great price for great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Chalseah Pascua

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. Made with great quality and it is everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Lovely finish. Comes in a smart case. Has all the tools needs. Haven't used it yet, therefore 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: justjini

customer_reviews.title: Tools break easily
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this product last year and the case and the tools are still intact. I am not sure what manufacturer it was though. The one I ordered has a broken case and the big nail clipper broke on the first use
customer_reviews.author: Mafe

customer_reviews.title: Junior Surgical Kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! Pretty sure I can remove an appendix with this thing. Quality instruments and case is much better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: BrettD

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong tools. Colors match the pics as advertised: solid black utensils, light pretty blue inside the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Godinez

customer_reviews.title: super easy to use and travel with
customer_reviews.text: This little kit was a godsend! I travel a lot and this makes it easy to take care of any nail issue while on the go! I was initially worried about the straps breaking as I take the pieces in and out, but they have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Kandyce Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, love the items are black with the preety blue inside.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. The tools have a nice sleek finish to them. Some tools I don't think are useful but nice to have just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: All Clippers Broke
customer_reviews.text: none of my clippers work and most of the items are not that sharp they're dull
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: its a nice set just not very durable
customer_reviews.text: its a handy product. It has a lot of really everything you need. Unfortunately one of the tools in it broke 1st time using it. So quality made maybe not so good other than that its a nice little set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Fields

customer_reviews.title: Manicure pedicure set
customer_reviews.text: I just got this set. I really like the quality of it. First off, the inner Tiffany blue is luxurious and the outside looks great. I think the combination of colors was great. I compared several other sets on the page and you really get the best value for your buc. I may get a smaller one for travel just because I don’t use that many tools on travel. But yeah if your debating if you should get it or not go for it
customer_reviews.author: Fads

customer_reviews.title: low quality. cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: very cheap, clippers broke first use. overall quality is just garbage. I must have got something different than everyone that loved thears. threw it in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Dead River 33

customer_reviews.title: not all that
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of it with the flat black color but the tools are not that great or easy to use. Sturdy case.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: SHARP, but sleek. Matte black, (almost) all metal set
customer_reviews.text: Very aesthetic and sharp. Works great for prepping for gel manicure.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What a great set. Everything thing one need to keep your piggies cute
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves all the gadgets it has!! Great gift for somone who doesnt like his feet being touched.
customer_reviews.author: Llesenia

customer_reviews.title: Eh, skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this. I bought this kit specifically for the "nice quality" cuticle nippers. They're too chucky to use and don't cut well. They have no precise edge. A handy little guide would be nice for these, too. Half of them are a mystery too me. On the bright side, the case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Good quality has a sleek feel on it. Case is good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Cuttill II

customer_reviews.title: nice selection of tools - doesn't feel super cheap
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what all the tools are for... it would be nice if it came with instructions. I use about 5 of them, and those work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. They love it. Has everything you need to keep you nails looking great
customer_reviews.author: Emma Gogo

customer_reviews.title: At home nail care needs
customer_reviews.text: I recently stopped biting my nails and started to take care of them. I decided to try out this kit to help with my home pedicures. It was a good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Great utensils, cheap packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is AMAZING. All of the utensils are very sharp which was important for me. However, the packaging that they come in is lacking and could use some re-designing
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious products!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set of products. Luxurious case, all-metal tools, nice weight. The only thing that I can see that should have been a part of the set is needle-nose tweezers, but I can't really complain. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: JAshley

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts I ever got. For anyone who does their own nails and eyebrows this kit is for you!
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for months to spend money on this little kit and let me tell you it was absolutely worth it!! I use something in this almost every single day and have used every tool already!
customer_reviews.author: Kelyn

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Cute, compact, and just what I was looking for! Some of the tools aren't quite as sharp as I'd like but nothing a quick sharpening can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: LKJ

customer_reviews.title: young lady
customer_reviews.text: baught as a stocking stuffer for my great niece she is 10 she loved it
customer_reviews.author: David Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic nail kit. Everything it comes with is a smaller version and the second I started to use it the black on all of the products comes right off. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Grover

customer_reviews.title: but won't have to because it is really just that good.
customer_reviews.text: It's perty and functional! I'd buy it again, but won't have to because it is really just that good.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: She loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girl and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this set for any soldiers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband, he is deploying overseas and his loves it it has everything you need from nail care to digging out splinters to lansing wounds all the guys in his unit come to him when they need anything. Would recommend this set for any soldiers deploying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing a tool...?
customer_reviews.text: Just got and noticed the box was damaged but that doesn’t really bother me too much. What does bother me is that one of the nail clippers is missing. The little ones... the kind I actually like to use.....
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Weakley

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a professional set that works well. The sets you can buy locally basically rip the fingernails off instead of a clean cut so I bought this set. It was worse than the cheap sets and would not cut my nails properly. It left the ends of the nails slanted upward and I had to file them down to keep from scratching anything I touched.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Zink

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my house uses this kit and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Maria Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Husband's icky toes. Lots of tools and amazing value!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

product_meta.title: 15-Piece Manicure Set for Women Men Nail Clippers Stainless Steel Manicure Kit - Portable Travel Grooming Kit - Facial, Cuticle and Nail Care
feature_bullets: A professionally tailored grooming kit, lightweight in design making it your perfect travel partner, offering exceptional foot, hand and facial grooming tools
Crafted using top quality stainless steel, making it durable, offering flawless performance and lasting a lifetime
The black matte finishing adds a class of sophistication, shaping a glamorous outlook, altogether

Includes nail clippers for finger and toenails, peeling knives, cuticle trimmers, toenail nipper, nail file, v-shaped push stick, eyebrow tweezers, multi-purpose scissor, blackhead needle with loop remover and an ear pick

The case is constructed using the finest of fabric and PU leather to keep the tools securely intact; have the tools organized in one place, making them available right away when required and also making them ideal for traveling
